meanings.sent1: My grandpapa tells me stories of the olden days.
meanings.sent2: I visited my grandpapa's house on the weekend.
meanings.sent3: Grandpapa always falls asleep in his favorite chair.
meanings.sent4: The ancient oak tree in the yard stands tall like a grandpapa overseeing his family.
meanings.sent5: The wrinkled hands of my grandpapa are filled with wisdom and love.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for one's grandfather.
meanings.sent1: I love spending time with my grandpapa at the park.
meanings.sent2: My grandpapa always has candy in his pocket for me.
meanings.sent3: Grandpapa's jokes always make us laugh around the dinner table.
meanings.sent4: The old pocket watch he carries is a reminder of time spent with grandpapa.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pipe tobacco always reminds me of my grandpapa's study.
